```{r}
# clear the workspace
rm(list=ls())

prime <- function(n) {
    # returns TRUE if n is prime
    # assumes n is a positive integer
    if (n == 1) {
        is.prime <- FALSE
    } else if (n == 2) {
        is.prime <- TRUE
    } else {
        is.prime <- TRUE
        for (m in 2:(n/2)) {
            if (n %% m == 0) is.prime <- FALSE
        }
    }
    # return(is.prime)
  return(list(n, is.prime))
}



```

```{r}
prime(7)
prime(4)
```

```{r}
vec <- seq(2:24)

primes <- sapply(vec, prime)
primes
```
